title: Vertical Scrolling of contents towards the end produce stretch effect on the page that doesn't often look good
body: It does not look professional when scrolling upward at the end of any page or downward at the top the content of the page regardless of material or application will be stretched down

comments.body: It is part of the effect through the whole operating system and does not particularly belong to any application. Sometime the stretched content of the page does not look professional.
